class.name: ShaderTemplate
class.brief_description: A shader template implementing the core vertex and fragment shaders.
class.description: A shader template can be used to override Godots built-in shader code with a custom implementation. [b]Note:[/b] This feature is currently only available for spatial shaders on the mobile and forward+ renderer.

method.name: get_mode
method.description: Returns the shader mode for the shader template.

members.member: The shader template GLSL code for both vertex and fragment shaders.
